mapper.insert: insert into topic(topic_id, author_id, title, content, create_time, modify_time) value (#{topicId}, #{authorId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime});
mapper.select: select t.topic_id, username as author, ur.user_id as author_id, ui.face as face, title, t.content, t.create_time, t.modify_time, ifnull(count(c.id), 0) as comment_total from topic t inner join user_registration ur on ur.user_id = t.author_id inner join user_info ui on ur.user_id = ui.user_id left join comment c on t.topic_id = c.topic_id where t.topic_id = #{topicId} group by t.topic_id

select t.topic_id, username as author, ui.face as face, title, t.create_time, t.modify_time, ifnull(count(c.id), 0) as comment_total from topic t inner join user_registration ur on ur.user_id = t.author_id inner join user_info ui on ur.user_id = ui.user_id left join comment c on t.topic_id = c.topic_id group by t.topic_id, t.create_time order by t.create_time desc

(select t.topic_id, username as author, ui.face as face, title, t.create_time, t.modify_time, ifnull(count(c.id), 0) as comment_total, 1 as related_type_code from topic t inner join user_registration ur on ur.user_id = t.author_id inner join user_info ui on ur.user_id = ui.user_id left join comment c on t.topic_id = c.topic_id where t.author_id = #{userId} group by t.topic_id, t.create_time order by t.create_time desc) union all (select t.topic_id, username as author, ui.face as face, title, t.create_time, t.modify_time, ifnull(count(c.id), 0) as comment_total, 2 as related_type_code from comment c inner join topic t on c.topic_id = t.topic_id inner join user_registration ur on ur.user_id = t.author_id inner join user_info ui on ur.user_id = ui.user_id where c.author_id = #{userId} group by t.topic_id, t.create_time order by t.create_time desc)
